subject: Gieki Credits (TRC-20) swap to new GiekiCoin (BEP-20)
content: We ask everyone who has Gieki Credits (GKG) on our exchange, to visit the swap page immediately (https://giekicoin.com/swap/), because from April 16 to April 25 there is a swap from TRC-20 to BEP-20 token. Follow the instructions on the website to swap coins.

subject: Butkoin Swap Announcement
content: Butkoin (BUT) deposits and withdrawals are stopped until SWAP to BUTK new chain, which will happen on 1st February. We will automatically swap your existing coins in our wallet, so you don't need take any action.
